T04bsa021_u:1: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaścet /
T04bsa021_u:3: atha sasvabhāvametadvākyaṃ śrutvā hatā pratijñā te /
T04bsa021_u:6: śabdenātra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasya // Vv_3 //
T04bsa021_u:8: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato duṣyate na mama // Vv_4 //
T04bsa021_u:9: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvan yadyupalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
T04bsa021_u:17: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ityevam /
T04bsa021_u:18: nāmāpi bhavennaivaṃ nāmāpi nirvastukaṃ nāsti // Vv_9 //
T04bsa021_u:19: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
T04bsa021_u:20: dharmairvinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktamupadeṣṭum // Vv_10 //
T04bsa021_u:21: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ityayaṃ yasmāt /
T04bsa021_u:22: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt // Vv_11 //
T04bsa021_u:23: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratividhyate tvayānena /
T04bsa021_u:24: vacanenarte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hyasataḥ // Vv_12 //
T04bsa021_u:26: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syātte pratiṣidhyato hyasataḥ // Vv_13 //
T04bsa021_u:27: nanvevaṃ satyasti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tagdṛhītaṃ ca /
T04bsa021_u:28: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat // Vv_14 //
T04bsa021_u:29: atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
T04bsa021_u:30: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro 'sya tu na santi // Vv_15 //
T04bsa021_u:31: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraśca yadyuta na santi /
T04bsa021_u:32: siddhā hi sarvabhāvā yeṣāmevaṃ svabhāvaśca // Vv_16 //
T04bsa021_u:33: hetostato na siddhirnaiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
T04bsa021_u:35: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
T04bsa021_u:38: loke naiḥsvābhāvyānna hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ // Vv_19 //
T04bsa021_u:39: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyamiti ca nopapannam /
T04bsa021_u:43: yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā hyuktā /
T04bsa021_u:44: yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam // Vv_22 //
T04bsa021_u:46: pratisedhayase yadvat pratiṣedho 'yaṃ tathaiva syāt // Vv_23 //
T04bsa021_u:48: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśeṣahetuśca na nigadyaḥ // Vv_24 //
T04bsa021_u:49: mā śabdavaditi nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yastvayā mamārabdhaḥ /
T04bsa021_u:50: śabdena hi tacca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naiva me vacaḥ // Vv_25 //
T04bsa021_u:52: naiḥsvābhāvyanivṛttau svābhāvyaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ syāt // Vv_26 //
T04bsa021_u:55: athavā sādhyasamo 'yaṃ heturna hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
T04bsa021_u:56: saṃvyavahāraṃ ca vayaṃ nānabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ // Vv_28 //
T04bsa021_u:57: yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syādeṣa me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
T04bsa021_u:58: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ // Vv_29 //
T04bsa021_u:62: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām // Vv_31 //
T04bsa021_u:64: nādeḥ siddhistatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya // Vv_32 //
T04bsa021_u:68: na hi tasyānupalabdhirdṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya // Vv_35 //
T04bsa021_u:70: paramiva na tvātmānaṃ paridhakṣyatyapi hutāśaḥ // Vv_36 //
T04bsa021_u:72: pracchādayiṣyati tamaḥ svaparātmānau hutāśa iva // Vv_37 //
T04bsa021_u:73: nāsti tamaśca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhati sadātmani jvalanaḥ /
T04bsa021_u:74: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo 'ndhakāravadhaḥ // Vv_38 //
T04bsa021_u:76: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ // Vv_39 //
T04bsa021_u:80: bhavati pramāṇasiddhirna parāpekṣā hi siddhiriti // Vv_41 //
T04bsa021_u:81: anapekṣya hi prameyānarthān yadi te pramāṇasiddhiḥ /
T04bsa021_u:82: bhavati na bhavati kasyacidevamimāni pramāṇāni // Vv_42 //
T04bsa021_u:85: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇyapekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
T04bsa021_u:88: kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat // Vv_45 //
T04bsa021_u:90: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇām // Vv_46 //
T04bsa021_u:91: atha tai pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā cā
T04bsa021_u:93: sidhyanti hi pramāṇairyadi prameyāṇi tāni taireva /
T04bsa021_u:94: sādhyāni ca prameyaistāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // Vv_48 //
T04bsa021_u:95: sidhyanti ca prameyairyadi pramāṇāni tāni taireva /
T04bsa021_u:96: sādhyāni ca prameyaistāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // Vv_49 //
T04bsa021_u:97: pitrā yadyutpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
T04bsa021_u:98: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam // Vv_50 //
T04bsa021_u:99: kaśca pitā kaḥ putrastatra tvaṃ brūhi tāvubhāvapi ca /
T04bsa021_u:102: bhavati na ca prameyairna cāpyakasmāt pramāṇānām // Vv_52 //
T04bsa021_u:105: yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
T04bsa021_u:106: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati // Vv_54 //
T04bsa021_u:107: atha na pratītya kiṃcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
T04bsa021_u:108: dharmāṇāmevaṃ syāda vāso na brahmacaryasya // Vv_55 //
T04bsa021_u:109: nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāśca laukikā na syuḥ /
T04bsa021_u:112: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavatyevam // Vv_57 //
T04bsa021_u:113: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sa svabhāva ityevam /
T04bsa021_u:114: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaśca na vyaṃ sat // Vv_58 //
T04bsa021_u:115: nāmāsaditi ca yadidaṃ tatkiṃ nu sato bhavatyutāsataḥ /
T04bsa021_u:116: yadi hi sato yadyasato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ // Vv_59 //
T04bsa021_u:118: sa upālambhastasmād bhavatyayaṃ ca pratijñāyāḥ // Vv_60 //
T04bsa021_u:119: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata iti /
T04bsa021_u:121: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanvapratiṣiddhamidam /
T04bsa021_u:122: pratiṣedhayate hi bhavān bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvam // Vv_62 //
T04bsa021_u:123: pratiṣedhayase 'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tacca nāsti śūnyatvam /
T04bsa021_u:124: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanvevaṃ hīyate vādaḥ // Vv_63 //
T04bsa021_u:125: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣedhyamasti na ca kiṃcit /
T04bsa021_u:126: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasītyadhilaya eva tvayā kriyate // Vv_64 //
T04bsa021_u:128: atra jñāpayate vāgasaditi tanna pratinihanti // Vv_65 //
T04bsa021_u:130: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ // Vv_66 //
T04bsa021_u:131: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syāt bhāvo na syāt pratītyasamudbhūtaḥ /
T04bsa021_u:132: yaśca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva // Vv_67 //
T04bsa021_u:133: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kastaṃ nivartayed grāhyam /
T04bsa021_u:135: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
T04bsa021_u:137: yastraikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
T04bsa021_u:139: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
T04bsa021_u:140: prabhavati na tasya kiṃ na bhavati śūnyatā yasyeti // Vv_71 //
